info.title: Microsoft Cognitive Language Service - Analyze Text Authoring
info.description: The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms. The API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection and question answering. Further documentation can be found in https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/language-service/overview.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

values.name: CustomSingleLabelClassification
values.description: For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each file will have only one label. For example, file 1 is classified as A and file 2 is classified as B.

values.name: CustomMultiLabelClassification
values.description: For building a classification model to classify text using your own data. Each file can have one or many labels. For example, file 1 is classified as A, B, and C and file 2 is classified as B and C.

values.name: CustomEntityRecognition
values.description: For building an extraction model to identify your domain categories using your own data.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

TextAnalysisAuthoringConfusionMatrixCell.description: Represents a cell in a confusion matrix.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCreateDeploymentOpt.description: Represents the options for creating or updating a project deployment.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCreateProjectOption.description: Represents the options used to create or update a project.

multilingual.description: Whether the project would be used for multiple languages or not.

language.description: The project language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomEntityRecogni.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom entity recognition project.

customEntityRecognitionResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for entity recognition.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomEntityRecogni.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom entity recognition project.

customEntityRecognitionEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to extraction evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomMultiLabelCla.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom multi-label classification project.

customMultiLabelClassificationResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for multi label classification.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomMultiLabelCla.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom multi-label classification project.

customMultiLabelClassificationEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to multi label classification evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomSingleLabelCl.description: Represents the document evaluation result for a custom single-label classification project.

customSingleLabelClassificationResult.description: Represents the evaluation prediction for single label classification.

TextAnalysisAuthoringCustomSingleLabelCl.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom single-label classification project.

customSingleLabelClassificationEvaluatio.description: Contains the data related to single label classification evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDeploymentJobState.description: Represents the state of a deployment job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityLabel.description: Represents an evaluation result entity label.

offset.description: Represents the entity offset index relative to the original text.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityRecog.description: Represents the entity recognition evaluation result for a document.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEntityRegio.description: Represents the evaluation comparison between the expected and predicted entities of a document region.

expectedEntities.description: Represents the region's expected entity labels.

predictedEntities.description: Represents the region's predicted entity labels.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentEvaluationR.description: Represents the evaluation result of a document.

language.description: Represents the document language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentMultiLabelC.description: Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted classes that are result from the evaluation operation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringDocumentSingleLabel.description: Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted class that result from an evaluation operation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringEntityEvaluationSum.description: Represents the evaluation summary for an entity.

truePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of true positive

trueNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of true negative

falsePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of false positive

falseNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of false negative

TextAnalysisAuthoringEntityRecognitionEv.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom entity recognition project.

confusionMatrix.description: Represents the confusion matrix between two entities (the two entities can be the same). The matrix is between the entity that was labelled and the entity that was predicted.

microF1.description: Represents the micro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microPrecision.description: Represents the micro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microRecall.description: Represents the micro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroF1.description: Represents the macro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroPrecision.description: Represents the macro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroRecall.description: Represents the macro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

TextAnalysisAuthoringEvaluationOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

kind.description: Represents the evaluation kind. By default, the evaluation kind is set to percentage.

trainingSplitPercentage.description: Represents the training dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the evaluation kind is percentage.

testingSplitPercentage.description: Represents the testing dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the evaluation kind is percentage.

TextAnalysisAuthoringEvaluationSummary.description: Represents the summary for an evaluation operation.

projectKind.description: Represents the project type that the evaluation ran on.

evaluationOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportProjectJobSta.description: Represents the state of an export job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

resultUrl.description: The URL to use in order to download the exported project.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedClass.description: Represents a class of an exported project.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedCustomEntit.description: Represents an exported document for a custom entity recognition project.

entities.description: The list of entity labels belonging to the document.

location.description: The location of the document in the storage.

language.description: Represents the document language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

dataset.description: The dataset for this document. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

TextAnalysisAuthoringExportedCustomEntit.description: Represents the exported assets for a entity recognition project.

entities.description: The list of entities belonging to the project.

documents.description: The list of documents belonging to the project.

dataset.description: The dataset for this document. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

TextAnalysisAuthoringTrainingJobResult.description: Represents the output of a training job.

estimatedEndDateTime.description: Represents the estimate end date time for training and evaluation.

TextAuthoringProjectSettings.description: Represents the settings used to define the project behavior.

confidenceThreshold.description: The threshold of the class with the highest confidence, at which the prediction will automatically be changed to "None". The value of the threshold should be between 0 and 1 inclusive.
